data.title: Abhishek Bachchan's Alleged Divorce Announcement Video Sparks Outrage: AI
meta_keywords: viral video of abhishek bachchan’s divorce claim
data.meta_description: A video claiming that Abhishek Bachchan announced his divorce from Aishwarya Rai has gone viral online. The video, which features noticeable lip-syncing issues, spread rapidly and has been widely condemned by netizens who suspect it may be a fake. Abhishek is not alone in facing AI-related manipulation; earlier, celebrities such as Aamir Khan, Ranveer Singh, Rashmika Mandanna, Katrina Kaif, and Kajol also fell victim to deepfake technology. Rumours about Ash and Abhi’s relationship have been trending on social media for some time. Recently, the mother-daughter duo enjoyed a vacation in New York without Abhishek and were notably distant from the Bachchans at the Ambani wedding. Abhishek's recent like on a divorce-related post has further fueled the buzz. On the work front, Abhishek will next be seen in Remo D'Souza's film 'Be Happy.'
data.text:
WHEN & WHERE are Newly Engaged Naga Chaitanya & Sobhita Dhulipala Tying The Knot?

In this video, we're uncovering all the details about Naga Chaitanya & Sobhita Dhulipala's upcoming wedding. When are they set to tie the knot? Where will the grand celebration take place? We've got all the details and insights you won't want to miss! From the rumoured date and venue, we’ve got it all covered. Watch the complete video now!

103 views | 12 hours ago

Meet Sarkata: Everything You Need to Know About the 7.7 Ft Tall Wrestler

Shraddha Kapoor and Rajkummar Rao return to Chanderi to confront a new villain in Stree 2. The new antagonist, known as 'Sarkata,' is a headless terror portrayed by Sunil Kumar. Sunil Kumar, who has also gained attention for his role as Ashwatthama in Kalki 2898 AD, recently shared photos with Stree 2 stars Tamannaah, Rajkummar Rao, and Pankaj Tripathi. Known as the Great Khali of Jammu, Sunil Kumar has made waves both on and off-screen. Stree 2 has quickly become the 29th biggest Bollywood hit within just 5 days. Here's everything you need to know about Sunil Kumar.

267 views | 1 day ago

Aamir Khan Gets Emotional on Rhea Chakraborty’s Show, Praises Her Courage

Rhea Chakraborty recently had a heartfelt conversation with Aamir Khan on her new talk show, which she promoted on Instagram with a teaser clip. In the promo, Rhea highlighted that their discussion covered 'stardom, films, therapy, and grief.' At one moment, Aamir Khan was seen wiping away tears while sharing his experiences, reflecting on how his "Chapter 2" began. He also praised Rhea, likely acknowledging her resilience following Sushant Singh Rajput's death. The interaction included light-hearted moments, with Rhea complimenting Aamir’s looks, prompting him to humorously compare himself to other stars like Hrithik, Salman, and Shah Rukh. Aamir also revealed his desire to leave films, which sparked intrigue among fans. The response to Rhea's post was mixed; while some comments were positive, many others were negative and critical towards both Rhea and Aamir. Rhea was last seen as a gang leader on a TV reality show.

2689 views | 2 days ago

Jasmin Walia’s Old Picture and Hardik Pandya’s Social Media Activity Fuel Cheating Rumours

Following the viral sensation of Jasmin Walia and Hardik Pandya’s matching vacation posts, a new wave of speculation has emerged. An old selfie of Jasmin at a Mumbai Indians IPL match has sparked fresh rumors, showing her with a Mumbai Indians flag, which some believe links her to Hardik Pandya. Additionally, another user shared a picture of Jasmin that features an arm with a tattoo similar to Hardik's, intensifying the speculation. Compounding the buzz, old social media posts revealing that Hardik liked Jasmin’s photos have also resurfaced. These viral photos have prompted a heated debate on social media, with questions such as "Did Hardik cheat on Natasa?" coming to the forefront. Hardik Pandya was previously married to actress Natasa Stankovic; the couple wed in 2020 and welcomed their child, Agastya, in 2021. However, Hardik and Natasa announced their separation in July 2024.

3684 views | 6 days ago
